## Task 1 - Parse
```{r echo = TRUE}
d = readLines("~cr173/Sta523/data/world_cup_goals_raw.txt")
library(stringr)
d[1]
t = d[1]
#Match id
idRead = str_match_all(d, " id=\"([a-z0-9]*)\"")
id = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  id[i,] = idRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match pig
pigRead = str_match_all(d, " pig=\"([0-9]*)\"")
pig = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  pig[i,] = pigRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match class
classRead = str_match_all(d, " class=\"([a-z ]*)\"")
class = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  class[i,] = classRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match pid
pidRead = str_match_all(d, " pid=\"([0-9]*)\"")
pid = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  pid[i,] = pidRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match mid
midRead = str_match_all(d, " mid=\"([0-9]*)\"")
mid = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  mid[i,] = midRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match pname
pnameRead = str_match_all(d, " pname=\"(.*)\" pteam=")
pname = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  pname[i,] = pnameRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match pteam
pteamRead = str_match_all(d, " pteam=\"(.*)\" ptime=")
pteam = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  pteam[i,] = pteamRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match ptime
ptimeRead = str_match_all(d, " ptime=\"([0-9 ]*)\"")
ptime = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  ptime[i,] = ptimeRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match paddtime
paddtimeRead = str_match_all(d, " paddtime=\"([0-9 ]*)\"")
paddtime = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  paddtime[i,] = paddtimeRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match ptype
ptypeRead = str_match_all(d, " ptype=\"(.*)\" pteamimg=")
ptype = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  ptype[i,] = ptypeRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match pteamimg
pteamimgRead = str_match_all(d, " pteamimg=\"([a-z/a-z.a-z ]*)\"")
pteamimg = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  pteamimg[i,] = pteamimgRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match pmatch
pmatchRead = str_match_all(d, " pmatch=\"(.*)\" style=")
pmatch = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  pmatch[i,] = pmatchRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match style.right
style.rightRead = str_match_all(d, "right: ([0-9]*)px;")
style.right = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 2:193) {
  style.right[i,] = style.rightRead[[i]][,2] 
}

#Match style.left
style.leftRead = str_match_all(d, "left: ([0-9]*)px;")
style.left = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
style.left[1,] = style.leftRead[[1]][,2] 

#Match style.top
style.topRead = str_match_all(d, "top: ([0-9]*)px;")
style.top = matrix(NA, 193, 1, byrow = T)
for (i in 1:193) {
  style.top[i,] = style.topRead[[i]][,2] 
}

Data = data.frame(ID = id, pig = pig, class = class, pid = pid, mid = mid, pname = pname, pteam = pteam, ptime = ptime, paddtime = paddtime, ptype = ptype, pteamimg = pteamimg, pmatch = pmatch, style.left = style.left, style.right = style.right,style.top = style.top)
Data
```


## Task 3 - Translate
```{r echo = TRUE}
library(rjson)
for (i in 1:193) {
  cat(toJSON(Data[i,]))
  i = i + 1
}

```
